QuestData.Title: Quill of Stingers
QuestData.Description: To achieve perfect paint strokes, one must have the right tools. My own have fallen into disrepair, their bristles becoming as unmanageable as hozu hair.$b$bHave you seen the wasps throughout the Arboretum? Their stingers can be fashioned into quills that provide just the right level of sharpness in each line.$b$bCould you gather some for me please?
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 6 Wasp Stingers from Orchard Wasps.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you been able to acquire some stingers? I would normally ask a monk for help with this but they all seem to be elsewhere at the moment.
QuestData.RewardText: My thanks traveler. These will make a fine set of quills. Here is something for your trouble.
